visited for consultation with Dr. Abhimanyu in Sitaram bhartia hospital hospital staff was very helpful and the doctor explained everything in detail and got the investigation done in all experience was very good

I recently had a consultation with Dr. Abhimanyu at Sitaram Bhartia for posture correction, and I am extremely pleased with the experience. Dr. Abhimanyu was incredibly polite and attentive throughout our session. He listened carefully to my concerns and provided clear, detailed guidance on how to improve my posture. His expertise and professional demeanor made me feel confident and reassured. I highly recommend Dr. Abhimanyu to anyone seeking orthopedic care.
